 2017-01362017-02-17,  NRCAN,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of RICHARD SEXTON of Petawawa, Ontario, to be President and Chief Executive Officer of Atomic Energy of Canada Limited on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year or until such time as a new President and Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever occurs first.
